Take your blogdown Hugo site live created using RStudio. Rstudio to Github to Netflify. Simple step by step tutorial.

******
I made a mistake. Netlify does the build for us! We do not need to push the "public" folder at all, not even to GiHub. We push everything but the public folder!
*****

Netlify will build the site for us from the code! I had it completely backwards.
